text: Paranoid is the second studio album by Black Sabbath, an English heavy metal band. It was released on September 18, 1970. The album has many of the band's most popular songs, such as "Paranoid", "War Pigs" and "Iron Man". It went to number one on the United Kingdom's music chart. It also went on music charts in other countries. Many people say Paranoid is one of the first heavy metal albums. It has also helped change how heavy metal sounds. It is Black Sabbath's best selling album. It has sold over 1.6 million copies in the United States. == Track listing == All songs composed by Black Sabbath (Tony Iommi, Geezer Butler, Bill Ward, Ozzy Osbourne). == References == Category:1970 albums
title: Paranoid (album)
